japanese: 義を見てせざるは、なんとやらだな！/いくぜ！
english: Seeing justice and not acting... /Let's go!

japanese: 自分のパラメータが高いマスから/戦闘をしかけると有利になるかもね……。
english: Starting battles from spaces /where your parameters are high might help...

japanese: 英雄のツープラトン技/!c03『島津流　双龍正波拳』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Eiyu's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Shimazu Style Twin Dragon Wave Fist'!c07!

japanese: 色気/身長/内面
english: Sex appeal/ Height/ Inner self

japanese: 約束する！/必ず連れていってやる！/世界にな！
english: I promise! /I'll definitely take you! /Around the world!

japanese: 綺麗ね……/本当に、空まで燃えちゃいそう……
english: Beautiful... /really looks like the sky is burning...

japanese: 絶好の練習日和って/いいたいところだけど、/今日は、お店をがんばらなきゃ！
english: Want to say perfect practice weather, but /today I need to work hard at the shop!

japanese: 第一、ゆりかさんが/そんな目にあっていいわけないよ！
english: First of all, Yurika-san /shouldn't have to go through that!

japanese: 英雄先生、こずえ先輩、/何を見てるんですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, Kozue-senpai, /what are you looking at?

japanese: 私も九郎も、幼い頃から霧嶋家のために/働くための訓練を受けてきました。/戦う術、いえ、以上のことも……。
english: Kuro and I have trained for the Kirishima family since childhood. /Fighting techniques, and more...

japanese: 第一、ゆりかさんが/そんな目にあっていいわけないもの！
english: First of all, Yurika-san /shouldn't have to go through that!

japanese: 結婚相手がいるんですか、先生？
english: Have a marriage partner, sensei?

japanese: 素朴な疑問なんだけど、/ザキって、何で聖純女学院に/入学したの？
english: Simple question, but /why did Zaki enroll /at Seijun Girls' Academy?

japanese: 結婚するんですか、先生？
english: Are you getting married, sensei?

japanese: 綺麗だな……/本当に、空まで燃えてしまいそうだ……
english: Beautiful... /really looks like the sky is burning...

japanese: 美しいですよね……。/本当に……魂が吸い込まれるようだ……。/ねぇ、先輩……？
english: Beautiful... /really... feels like my soul is drawn in... /Right, senpai...?

japanese: 腰の具合が……/絶好調！/今度診て下さい
english: Back condition.../ Perfect!/ Check next time

japanese: 英雄先生……。/鼻の下伸びてる。
english: Eiyu-sensei... /your nose is drooling.

japanese: 私もいく/大変だね/いかないで
english: I'll go too/ That's tough/ Don't go

japanese: 自分の意見をちゃんといえる人に/なりたかったの。
english: I wanted to become /someone who can speak their mind.

japanese: 私も、ももちゃんを/誘おうと思ってたとこだよ。/さぁ、行こっ！
english: I was thinking of inviting /Momo-chan too. /Let's go!

japanese: 素朴な疑問なんだけど、/ザキって、何で聖純女学院に/入学したんだ？
english: Simple question, but /why did Zaki enroll /at Seijun Girls' Academy?

japanese: 聞いてくれよ、!0。/兄貴が、この前の大学の大会で/また完全試合をやったんだってよ！
english: Listen, !0. /My brother pitched /another perfect game at the university tournament!

japanese: 空手なんてできない！ ハッハッハ！/でもバレー選手の運動能力を/ナメちゃいけないよ！　何とかなるさ！！
english: Can't do karate! Hahaha! /But don't underestimate /a volleyball player's athleticism! I'll manage!!

japanese: 笑うと……、/笑うと天使みたいだし……。
english: When you laugh... /you look like an angel...

japanese: 考えても……、いいよ……。
english: Think about it... it's fine...

japanese: 笑うなんて、ヒドイなぁ……。/ザキのピンチだと思ったから、/危険をかえりみずに飛び出したのに……。
english: Laughing is mean... /I thought Zaki was in trouble, so /I rushed out without thinking of danger...

japanese: 精神の鍛練……ですか？
english: Mental training... is it?

japanese: 自分の力しか頼れず、/生き残るには、自分が強くなるしかない。/そんな生活の中で味わう孤独なんて……
english: Only able to rely on yourself, /to survive, you must get stronger. /The loneliness in that life...

japanese: 英雄先生、今日は晴れてよかったですね。
english: Eiyu-sensei, good thing it's sunny today.

japanese: 私も、髪を伸ばしてみようかな。
english: Maybe I'll grow my hair out too.

japanese: 私も努力しませんとね。
english: I need to work hard too.

japanese: 若いうちから/そんな事を言ってると、/先が思いやられるわね。
english: Saying that from a young age /worries me about your future.

japanese: 英雄先生……。/鼻の下、伸びてますよ。
english: Eiyu-sensei... /your nose is drooling.

japanese: 英雄先生、なんですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, what is it?

japanese: 英雄先生、何やってるんですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, what are you doing?

japanese: 英雄先生、何を持ってるんですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, what are you holding?

japanese: 素直に理由を話して、/美術部に頼んだほうがいいぜ。
english: Better to honestly explain /and ask the art club.

japanese: 総番長が抜けた後も、/ゲド高は、オレがまとめてみせる！
english: After the boss left, /I'll keep Gedokou together!

japanese: 聖純女学院の生徒って/みんな、お行儀がすごくいいの。/私って、ガサツかも……。
english: Seijun Girls' Academy students /all have great manners. /I'm maybe rough...

japanese: 英雄先生、佐渡先生、/どうしたんですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, Sado-sensei, /what's wrong?
